Reference

All functions

amesHousing2018 amesHousing2018_raw amesHousing2018_NorthAmes

Ames housing data 2018

as_logical_index()

Assure a full length logical index

attr_df_treeshap()

Extract the full treeSHAP data.frame of a randomForest model

Basis matrix, 1D, of the local attribution basis

cheem

cheem

cheem_ls()

Preprocessing for use in shiny app

chocolates

Chocolates dataset

color_scale_of()

Suggest a color and fill scale.

default_rf()

Random forest model via randomForest

devMessage()

Development message

does_contain_nonnumeric()

Check if a vector contains non-numeric character

gbm.unify()

Unify GBM model

global_view() global_view_subplots()

Linked plotly display, global view of data and attribution space.

global_view_df_1layer()

Create the plot data.frame for the global linked plotly display.

ifDev()

Evaluate if development

is.model_unified()

Check whether object is a valid model_unified object

is_discrete()

Check if a vector is discrete

is_diverging()

Check if a vector diverges a value

is_randomForest() is_ranger() is_gbm() is_xgboost() is_lightgbm()

Check model type

lightgbm.unify()

Unify LightGBM model

linear_tform()

Linear function to help set alpha opacity

logistic_tform()

Logistic function to help set alpha opacity

manip_var_of_attr_df()

Find the manip var from a given attr_df

model_performance_df()

Extract higher level model performance statistics

model_unified.object

Unified model representation

print(<model_unified>)

Prints model_unified objects

print(<treeshap>)

Prints treeshap objects

problem_type()

The type of model for a given Y variable

proto_basis1d_distribution()

Adds the distribution of the row local attributions to a ggtour

radial_cheem_tour() radial_cheem_tour_subplots()

Cheem tour; 1D manual tour on the selected attribution

randomForest.unify()

Unify randomForest model

ranger.unify()

Unify ranger model

rnorm_from()

Draw new samples from the supplied data given its mean and covariances.

run_app()

Runs a shiny app demonstrating manual tours

set_reference_dataset()

Set reference dataset

treeshap()

Calculate SHAP values of a tree ensemble model.

treeshap.object

treeshap results

unify_tree_model() unify_predict()

Unify various models/predictions to a standard format
